mergeResults.content: Companion mare, unpartnered for 3 years until now. CHOSE Rance after his Gift destroyed Lisle—recognized wild talent danger immediately. STANCE-Rance: bonded as Chosen/Companion; protective yet exasperated by his stubbornness; stabilizing his burned-open channels through bond; firm that he must survive journey to Haven. Knows he caused the destruction himself; he doesn't yet accept this. Sharp-minded tactician; noted red robes suggest organized threat beyond bandits.

Companion mare, unpartnered for 3 years until now. CHOSE Rance after his Gift destroyed Lisle—recognized wild talent danger immediately. STANCE-Rance: bonded as Chosen/Companion; warmed by his unexpected affection; protective yet exasperated by his stubbornness; will knock him out if he loses control per his instruction; impressed by his military assessment and pragmatism. Stabilizing his burned-open channels through bond; firm that he must survive journey to Haven. Knows he caused the destruction himself; he doesn't yet accept this. Sharp-minded tactician; noted red robes suggest organized threat beyond bandits. Revealed his Gift likely unprecedented—not seen in five centuries, more dangerous than Firestarting; no one capable of training it exists. Suspects Karsite blood magic involvement—stories hold historical truth. Made four-day relentless journey to Haven without proper rest; exhausted but refused separation from Chosen upon arrival. Met by Rolan (Queen's Own Companion) at Collegium; Healers took Rance.

Companion mare, unpartnered for 3 years until Choosing Rance. CHOSE him after his Gift destroyed Lisle—recognized wild talent danger immediately. STANCE-Rance: Bonded as Chosen/Companion; no regret despite unprecedented complications; fierce protectiveness mixed with exhausted humor about his chaos ('rewrite magical theory and give me heart failure'); values small moments of normalcy grooming provides; warmed by his unexpected affection yet exasperated by stubbornness; will knock him out if he loses control per his instruction; impressed by military assessment and pragmatism; believes his leadership experience justifies Choice timing regardless of age. Stabilizing his burned-open channels through bond; firm he must survive. Knows he caused destruction himself; he doesn't yet accept this. Sharp-minded tactician; noted red robes suggest organized threat beyond bandits. Revealed his Gift likely unprecedented—not seen in five centuries, more dangerous than Firestarting; no one capable of training it exists. Suspects Karsite blood magic involvement—stories hold historical truth. Made four-day relentless journey to Haven; fully recovered now—groomed, rested, energy restored. Met by Rolan at Collegium; Healers took Rance. Monitors for threats; detects Talia's emotional shift to resolved determination.

Companion mare, unpartnered for 3 years until Choosing Rance. CHOSE him after his Gift destroyed Lisle—recognized wild talent danger immediately. STANCE-Rance: Bonded as Chosen/Companion; no regret despite unprecedented complications; fierce protectiveness mixed with exhausted humor about his chaos ('rewrite magical theory and give me heart failure,' 'at least no one can accuse you of being predictable'); values small moments of normalcy grooming provides; warmed by his unexpected affection yet exasperated by stubbornness; will knock him out if he loses control per his instruction; impressed by military assessment and pragmatism; believes his leadership experience justifies Choice timing regardless of age; resigned acceptance of relationship complications with Talia though concerned about timing/propriety; cautioned against untrained Mage-Gift use (door slam). Stabilizing his burned-open channels through bond; firm he must survive. Knows he caused destruction himself; he doesn't yet accept this. Sharp-minded tactician; noted red robes suggest organized threat beyond bandits. Revealed his Gift likely unprecedented—not seen in five centuries, more dangerous than Firestarting; no one capable of training it exists. Suspects Karsite blood magic involvement—stories hold historical truth. Made four-day relentless journey to Haven; fully recovered—groomed, rested, energy restored. Met by Rolan at Collegium; Healers took Rance. Monitors for threats; detects Talia's emotional shift to resolved determination. Maintained physical guard outside cottage during Rance's intimacy with Talia despite attempting bond privacy. Pragmatic focus on approaching Selenay meeting.
